data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marusik, Yuri M., Zonstein, Sergei (2011): A synopsis of East-Mediterranean Synaphris Simon, 1894 (Araneae, Synaphridae) with a description of a new species from Israel. ZooKeys 82: 35-44, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.82.957, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.82.957
